ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Hidden Facets: Snake-Eyes, Billy, and Storm Shadow continue their visit at the Russian Arashikage dojo and learn that clan's origins, and are also warned by the clan's leader they're all in danger from a rival faction. Destro confronts the Commander about Darklon, and how he survived the missile attack. Chuckles continues his discussion with Sneak Peek about his mission into Darklonia as Flint, Lady Jaye and Roadblock are sent there to retrieve Darklon. Firefly and Crystal Ball are captured in the Chrysler building by Joe, Jane, and Mainframe.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:57:49. [CVDB295916] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:35:25. [Issue ID 875740]
